name: claw-fossil
effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive an anorith.
short_effect: Can be revived into an Anorith.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a claw.
flavor_text.platinum: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a claw.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a claw.
